message: Your score puts you in the high range, which means that you have been experiencing a lot of PTSD symptoms.
Many people who experience a trauma have this kind of reaction, at least for the first few weeks or months after the trauma.
But once the problems have gone on for a while or they start to make it hard to function at home, school, or work, it's time to ask for some help.
Are you currently connected with a healthcare provider for your PTSD?
